about_the_game:
Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warrior Pack for Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® III and Call of Duty®: Warzone™.

The Endowment pack includes:

- 'Koa King' Operator Skin
- 'Dethroned' SMG Weapon Blueprint
- '6-Karat Kicker' Marksman Rifle Weapon Blueprint
- 'Island Styling' Vehicle Skin
- 'Bone Skewer' Weapon Charm
- 'Lion Pride' Animated Emblem
- 'Triple Bone Trident' Weapon Sticker
- 'Rolling Mane' Animated Calling Card
- 1 Hour 2XP Player Token
- 1 Hour 2XP Weapon Token

The full purchase price for this special item, less VAT, will be donated to the Call of Duty Endowment (a charity registered in USA, EIN: 37-1589072). The Call of Duty Endowment provides grants to registered U.K. charities and not-for-profits in the U.S. which place unemployed and underemployed veterans in the U.K. and U.S. into high-quality jobs*. By purchasing this pack, you will directly contribute to the Endowment's mission.

Activision may update, replace, or remove this in-game content at any time.
detailed_description:
Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warrior Pack for Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® III and Call of Duty®: Warzone™.

The Endowment pack includes:

- 'Koa King' Operator Skin
- 'Dethroned' SMG Weapon Blueprint
- '6-Karat Kicker' Marksman Rifle Weapon Blueprint
- 'Island Styling' Vehicle Skin
- 'Bone Skewer' Weapon Charm
- 'Lion Pride' Animated Emblem
- 'Triple Bone Trident' Weapon Sticker
- 'Rolling Mane' Animated Calling Card
- 1 Hour 2XP Player Token
- 1 Hour 2XP Weapon Token

The full purchase price for this special item, less VAT, will be donated to the Call of Duty Endowment (a charity registered in USA, EIN: 37-1589072). The Call of Duty Endowment provides grants to registered U.K. charities and not-for-profits in the U.S. which place unemployed and underemployed veterans in the U.K. and U.S. into high-quality jobs*. By purchasing this pack, you will directly contribute to the Endowment's mission.

Activision may update, replace, or remove this in-game content at any time.
legal_notice:
*For more information please see https://www.callofdutyendowment.org.

The Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® III in-game contents in this Pack are not usable in Call of Duty®: Warzone™'s DMZ mode.

This pack is not cross-platform supported and may be accessible on Steam only.

© 2023 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, CALL OF DUTY WARZONE and MODERN WARFARE are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. All other trademarks and trade names are the properties of their respective owners. This product contains software technology licensed from Id Software ('Id Technology'). Id Technology © 1999-2023 Id Software, Inc. © 2023 The Call of Duty Endowment and Activision Publishing, Inc. The Call of Duty Endowment logos are trademarks of The Call of Duty Endowment.
